Hello. Sorry in advance for my English.

I is Linux Mint 17.1 x64. Driver Nvidia-349.

In a very small KSP 20-30 fps, when moving the camera observed friezes. Although Windows 8.1 I had around 80 FPS ...

I run as:

#!/bin/bash

LC_ALL=C ./KSP.x86_64

My system: GTX-670 2gb, i5-2500k 4.6@, 8gb RAM.

Please help to fix the problem ...

The Linux Thread. Is your best friend. It's helped me pretty much all the way with it.

Now I'm a complete noob when it comes to the OS ( Ubuntu in my case ) so forgive me, but from what that thread had tought me is that your issue is your mouse's polling rate.

How to do that on your installation is another matter upon which is beyond me.

On another note. Other then the distribution you have a similar pc. Do you by chance experience a lot of lag when mach effects occur?
